1.title: Krem au Krem, LLC
1.subtitle: Krem au Krem specialize in body butters, hair & body oils, lip balms, sugar scrubs, pomades, beard care, and much more! These products are 100% vegan, natural, plant-based, chemical/toxin free, cruelty free, & made with passion!

products.name: Whipped Body & Hair Butter
products.description: Homemade whipped body butter with all-natural ingredients designed to keep your skin hydrated, youthful, and healthy. This butter has many benefits to use such as relieving sensitive skin conditions such as dry skin, eczema, baby rashes, hyper-pigmentation, discoloration, bug bites, dark marks, stretch marks, etc.

products.name: Scented Pomade
products.description: Pomades are a great supplemental moisturizer (for body butter) in the summer months. This can be shipped in the mail without being affected by the heat. It is multi-use and can be used to moisturize your lips, hands, skin, hair, and beards!

products.name: Lip Balm
products.description: Organic Natural Lip Balm that is homemade and great for dry lips or any lips. The ingredients listed below were all included to keep your lips smooth, full, and healthy even after application!

2.title: Natural Cuties

products.name: I am a Natural Cutie Book

products.name: Mug
products.description: Whether you’re drinking your morning coffee, your evening tea, or something in between – this mug’s for you! It’s sturdy and glossy with a vivid print that’ll withstand the microwave and dishwasher.

products.description: The Essential Bath & Body Set is a nourishing collection that will leave your skin feeling soft and moisturized all day. This set includes the Natural Sugar Based Body Wash, a bath puff, and the Nourishing Shea Body Lotion.

5.title: Does racism affect how you vote?
5.subtitle: Nate Silver has data that answers big questions about race in politics. For instance, in the 2008 presidential race, did Obama's skin color actually keep him from getting votes in some parts of the country? Stats and myths collide in this fascinating talk that ends with a remarkable insight.

5.title: Adwoa Beauty
5.subtitle: Adwoa beauty is a modern, non toxic, gender neutral beauty brand catering to multi-cultural hair textures. Buying hair products is a choice, not a command. We empathize with your experience in using tons of products that failed to deliver the results. We've created a highly effective collection of products with ingredients that are concentrated, working with nature and science to bring you immediate results. We are committed to being transparent with our ingredients.

products.name: baomint moisturizing curl defining cream
products.description: it’s your lucky day! our baomint moisturizing curl defining cream will be your new favorite styler. imagine a thick + creamy + rich cream that will leave your strands shiny, silky, and smooth just the way you like it.

products.name: baomint protect + shine oil blend
products.description: this eclectic mix of 15+ natural oils work together in balanced proportions to aid growth and add shine + strength to your hair. we’ve selected high-quality oils for absorption into the hair strands to penetrate from the inside out

products.name: be kinky sweatshirt
products.description: our very soft "be kinky" sweatshirt is a classic with our logo on the back.

6.title: As I Am
6.subtitle: As I Am hair is a natural hair care brand. It markets unique and exclusively formulated hair products. It consists of 11 products designed for tightly coiled hair made from the finest organic ingredients. The line then became a quick success.

products.name: Coconut CoWash 16 oz
products.description: You already know it and your hair can feel it! CoWashing is the way to cleanse your hair most of the time. This light no-suds conditioning cream gently removes residue including all of the things you've used to style and maintain your coils and curls. Now it's time for a sparkling new beginning.

products.name: Coils & Curls Care Package

products.name: Moisturizing Hand Sanitizer

6.title: Children's Books Starring Kids of Color
6.subtitle: Jambo Books is a children's book subscription company.  We send our members 2 or 3 books each month that feature a child of color as the star of a fiction story.
6.moreInfo:
Jambo Books serves children from birth to age 13. Our oldest members, ages 10-13, receive a middle grade novel and a nonfiction companion book that expands on a topic discussed in the novel. We focus on stories about children of color to delight your young readers and reaffirm your values of creating an inclusive and welcoming community.

Jambo means “Hello” in Swahili. Hello is an invitation to start a connection, to learn something new, to expand our notion of what it is to be human. Similarly, we invite our readers to build their own empathy muscles by reading about people who aren't exactly like themselves. Together, we affirm the humanity of every person.

7.title: Find Your Representatives
7.subtitle: Here you can find your representatives, how to contact them, bills they’ve introduced, committees they serve on, and political contributions they’ve received.

7.title: Classify White Supremacist Groups as Domestic Terrorist Organizations
7.subtitle: Request a new legal requirement to register, classify, and subsequently surveil white supremacist organizations as domestic terrorist organizations. By classifying these groups as intimidating to the American population and dangerous to human life, the institutions responsible for protecting citizens against such groups will have the necessary information and resources to prevent further destruction carried out by these violent terrorist groups.

8.title: Be A Good Person
8.subtitle: Instead of supporting the current trends of negativity, our #1 goal is to remind us all to approach our days with an optimistic, positive, and refreshed outlook. We believe that positive change truly starts with within ourselves, one person at a time.

products.name: Black Color Spectrum Shirt
products.description: Fashion fit, soft feel. Water based ink screen print. BAGP hem tag. Straight cut bottom

products.name: Reflective Core Bodysuit
products.description: One Piece bodysuit but versatile enough to be utilized as a swimsuit.

products.name: Cardinal Snapback Hat
products.description: Cardinal Snapback BE A GOOD PERSON Hat

8.title: How to Be an Antiracist
8.subtitle: Ibram X. Kendi's concept of antiracism reenergizes and reshapes the conversation about racial justice in America—but even more fundamentally, points us toward liberating new ways of thinking about ourselves and each other.

9.title: Kultured Misfits
9.subtitle: Kultured Misfits is a lifestyle, sport and ready-to-wear brand based out of Atlanta, Georgia. With a heavy influence from culture found in music, film, and art, we are driven to create timeless work by portraying an aesthetic that is uniquely our own to impact our everyday life.

products.name: Kultured Misfits Tracksuit (Crew + Joggers)
products.description: Classic Kultured Misfits tracksuIt set with matching crewneck and jogger pants in black. A comfortable cotton mix jogger, featuring embroidered Kultured Misfits logo on the left chest and thigh. Drawstring waist and cuffed hems.

products.name: Legalize Free College (Do Tha Right Thang) T-Shirt
products.description: Every sale of a Legalize Free College product will contribute to the "Legalize Free College Scholarship"!

products.name: MISFIT Embossed Crewneck
products.description: Premium crewneck is cut from French terry jersey. With the embossed cursive logo adds a signature finishing touch to its classic design.

9.title: Black Lives Matter
9.subtitle: We appreciate your support of the movement and our ongoing fight to end state-sanctioned violence, liberate Black people, and end white supremacy forever.

10.title: Color blind or color brave?
10.subtitle: The subject of race can be very touchy. As finance executive Mellody Hobson says, it's a "conversational third rail." But, she says, that's exactly why we need to start talking about it. In this engaging, persuasive talk, Hobson makes the case that speaking openly about race — and particularly about diversity in hiring — makes for better businesses and a better society.

10.title: Sorella
10.subtitle: Sorella was founded by two Boss Babes, Heather Sanders & Brittney Turner in 2012. We were 20 years old with no fashion background or training but a lot of hustle and drive! Starting with an inventory of 10 products and packing packages on the floor of our apartment, we never imagined how far we would get!

products.name: Navy Tie Dye Pant Set
products.description: Navy Tie Dye Pant Set

products.name: Nude Square Toe Heeled Sandal
products.description: Our Nude Square Toe Heeled Sandal will accompany any outfit just perfectly. A thong style sandal featuring a square toe front with the overall perfect nude to match all your fits.

products.name: Swish Seen It All T-Shirt
products.description: Shirt reads "I'm familiar with every ghetto". Shirts run oversize. For regular fit, we recommend going a size down

11.title: Marie Hunter Beauty
11.subtitle: Cosmetics and Fragrances for the Modern Muse. Boldly empowering women with beauty, confidence and class since 2016.

products.name: Queen Lipstick
products.description: Intense matte, super-rich formula delivers vibrant color with a velvety texture and long lasting comfort. A nourishing blend of oils and butters condition and soften lips. Advanced humectants deliver powerful hydration to help keep lips moist and supple.

products.name: Desert Sun Lipgloss
products.description: Lip Plumping Peptide Complex Maxi helps to stimulate collagen for a voluptuous look. Marine Filling Collagen Micro-Spheres instantly plump and hydrate. Mango, Kokam & Shea Butter hydrate and condition the lips while Vitamins A, C & E provide antioxidants to help protect lips from free radical damage.

products.name: Daily Hydration Cream
products.description: A daily moisturizer for intense hydration. A lightweight, quick absorbing cream that transforms skin into a supple, healthier looking appearance.

11.title: What Anti-racist Teachers Do Differently
11.subtitle: They view the success of black students as central to the success of their own teaching. Read more from Pirette McKamey, principal of San Francisco’s Mission High School and an anti-racist educator for more than 30 years.

12.title: So you want to talk about race
12.subtitle: Ijeoma Oluo guides readers of all races through subjects ranging from intersectionality and affirmative action to "model minorities" in an attempt to make the seemingly impossible possible: honest conversations about race and racism, and how they infect almost every aspect of American life.

12.title: Buttaz & Wax
12.subtitle: Buttaz & Wax is a handcrafted body butter and personal care line that came about after founder Keisha Marie made one of her body butters and her eight year old daughter looked up at her and said "mommy these are good, you should sell them".

products.name: Coco Loco Body Butter
products.description: Apply to any area of the body as needed. Best used after a shower when skin is still a bit damp. The butters and oils will lock moisture from shower into your skin.

products.name: Beard Oil
products.description: Work 3-5 drops of our beard oil into your hair revive your beard. Best used right after a shower while your beard is still damp

products.name: Lavender Soap
products.description: Our Lavender handcrafted soap, just like our Lavender bathsalts, smells like calming Lavender.

13.title: Seeing White Podcast Series
13.subtitle: Just what is going on with white people? Police shootings of unarmed African Americans. Acts of domestic terrorism by white supremacists. The renewed embrace of raw, undisguised white-identity politics. Unending racial inequity in schools, housing, criminal justice, and hiring. Some of this feels new, but in truth it’s an old story.

13.title: When the first all-black professional basketball team dominated...back in the ’20s
13.subtitle: "They were literally pioneers and recognized that they were making a statement in front of the audiences."

14.title: Lizzie's All Natural Products
14.subtitle: Here at Lizzie's All-natural Products, we create fresh, natural, toxin free products for your home and body. Our promise is to provide you with quality products that your skin will love and benefit from.

products.name: Eczema Butter & Oatmeal Soap Bundle
products.description: Save $$ when you bundle our Best Selling Original Unscented Eczema Butter and Oatmeal & Honey Soap. Both are great for eczema, nourishing, smooths skin, helps reduce inflammation/flare ups, lighten dark marks and soothes skin.

products.name: Eczema Oil
products.description: If you have tried our Eczema Butter, then you will LOVE this eczema oil. Our 8 ounce bottle of eczema oil is has all the amazing ingredients like our eczema butter does, just in the oil form. Allow the power of nature to nurture your eczema with our all-natural eczema butter.

products.name: Essential Oil
products.description: All of our essential oils are pure therapeutic grade and offer various health benefits.

14.title: Justice for Dominique Fells
14.subtitle: June 9th, another black trans woman named Dominique Fells was murdered and thrown in a river. The violence against black trans women needs to stop. We cannot allow for the murder of this young woman to go unpunished.

15.title: Very Puzzled
15.subtitle: As a parent it can be quite challenging to find items such as books and toys that are representative of the diverse society that we live in.  It is important that children see other people that look different to themselves in the books and toys that they interact with to ensure that they appreciate their own heritage and respect the heritage and culture of others.

products.name: 100 piece Africa Map Giant Jigsaw Puzzle
products.description: Puzzles are really great way for you and your extended family to bond with a child.  The very puzzled Africa Map Puzzle is definitely something that you can get stuck into that is rewarding with 100 pieces and each country on the continent of Africa is represented with a variety of landmarks, monuments and attractions it will provide endless fun and topics of discussion that can be used as fun way to learn for both children and adults.

products.name: Ethiopia colour-in t-shirt
products.description: The Ethiopia colour-in t-shirt makes perfect gift for any child with a creative edge or a group activity for parties or play dates.⁠

products.name: Ghana Map Poster
products.description: The Very Puzzled Ghana map poster is an A2 poster that accurately reflects the map of Ghana each region of Ghana is represented with a variety of landmarks, monuments and attractions it will provide endless fun and topics of discussion that can be used as fun way to learn for both children and adults.

15.title: Build for Black Lives
15.subtitle: Are you an anti-racist designer, developer, data scientist, or marketing specialist interested in committing to pro bono projects to work towards reparations and racial justice? Work on one of our available projects.

16.title: Toni Morrison - Biography
16.subtitle: Toni Morrison was a Nobel and Pulitzer Prize-winning American novelist. Among her best-known novels are "The Bluest Eye," "Song of Solomon," "Beloved," and "A Mercy."

16.title: Shy Chy Books
16.subtitle: Shy Chy Books will offer a series of books all about encouraging children to be themselves and embracing their individuality. The first book, I can't, I can't... I CAN! is about a girl who desires to make friends and participate in different activities, but she is held back by her shyness.

17.title: 3 ways to speak English
17.subtitle: Jamila Lyiscott is a "tri-tongued orator" in her powerful spoken-word essay "Broken English," she celebrates — and challenges — the three distinct flavors of English she speaks with her friends, in the classroom and with her parents. As she explores the complicated history and present-day identity that each language represents, she unpacks what it means to be "articulate."

17.title: 22 Maps & Charts Explaining Mass Incarceration
17.subtitle: America is number one — in incarceration. Over the past several decades, the country has built the largest prison population in the entire world, with the second-highest prison population per capita behind the tiny African country of Seychelles. But how did it get this way?

18.title: Soul Cap
18.subtitle: Haircare for the volume-blessed. Being blessed with voluminous hair shouldn’t come with the curse of harsh chemicals or mediocre products.

18.title: End Police Militarization and Over-Policing
18.subtitle: The tragic and unnecessary killings of George Floyd, Breonna Taylor, Tony McDade – and countless Black people at the hands of law enforcement – confirms what we've known for too long: Lawmakers must take serious action to fix the racist policing systems in our country.

19.title: Official Black Wall Street
19.subtitle: Get thousands of Black-owned businesses at your fingertips with the largest online platform for Black businesses.

19.title: Good Thoughts Tea Co
19.subtitle: We are an all natural loose leaf tea company that is centered around the healing properties of herbs. Our main goal is to help heal from the inside out all while reawakening the conversation and experience of tea. Started in 2014 by Ebone’ McCloud, we are located in and operate from Chicago.

products.name: Cinammon Chai
products.description: Cinnamon Chai is our take on the classic chai blend. Benefits: aids digestion, promotes a peace of mind, antioxidant support.

products.name: Tea Spoon Set
products.description: These delightful beauties are great for the perfect scoops of our loose leaf tea blends. With each set comes two sizes.

20.title: Whistling Vivaldi
20.subtitle: Claude M. Steele, who has been called "one of the few great social psychologists," offers a vivid first-person account of the research that supports his groundbreaking conclusions on stereotypes and identity.

20.title: Riot Swim
20.subtitle: Riot Swim is an online designer swimwear and beachwear brand, offering an exclusive collection of bikinis, one piece swimsuits, and more.

products.name: Echo One Piece- Kiwi
products.description: Minimal coverage front and back. Doubles as bodysuit. Body sculpting. Fitted at waist to flatter curves.

products.description: Full coverage top. Adjustable tie. Body sculpting. No Padding.

products.name: Riot Trunks-Black
products.description: Mesh lining. Gold hardware. European fit. Lightweight stretchy fabric . Side pockets. Functional back pocket. Mid length

21.title: The Sentencing Project
21.subtitle: The Sentencing Project promotes effective and humane responses to crime that minimize imprisonment and criminalization of youth and adults by promoting racial, ethnic, economic, and gender justice.

21.title: White Fragility: Why It's So Hard for White People to Talk About Racism
21.subtitle: This book explicates the dynamics of White Fragility and how we might build our capacity in the on-going work towards racial justice.

22.title: Mass Incarceration: Visualized
22.subtitle: Concrete actions, more than stated beliefs, are a true reflection of values, both personal and societal. We may claim to value human life, but our societal actions and policies say otherwise.

22.title: Bailee's Nail Box
22.subtitle: Bailee's Nail Box is a FUN box for girls, created by 11 year old Bailee K. for girls ages 4 - 12 who love all things nails! Bailee's goal was to create memorable boxes filled with different tools for fun nail designs with an extra girly accessory with each box.

products.name: Bailee's Bundle
products.description: Two safe non-toxic polishes - Bailee's Spark & Rose Shimmer. Nail polish ring holder. All natural hand scrub, made by Bailee, that will leave your hands smooth, moisturized and exfoliated.

products.name: Christmas Scrunchie
products.description: We have a variety of different colored Christmas scrunchies! Let us send you one!

products.name: My Beauty Secret is Gratitude
products.description: You've now found the staple t-shirt of your wardrobe. It's made of a thicker, heavier cotton, but it's still soft and comfy. And the double stitching on the neckline and sleeves add more durability to what is sure to be a favorite!

23.title: Diarrablu
23.subtitle: The Diarrablu mission is to iterate for sustainability while highlighting the African continent’s rich colors and unique patterns through practical and versatile pieces designed using mathematical concepts or algorithms.

products.name: Sustainable Mailys Dress - Noir
products.description: Sustainable, artisanal and size inclusive, the Mailys Dress is easily convertible into over 19 different styles. This garment is a comfortable and versatile dress thoughtfully designed to fit all body shapes and sizes.

products.name: Headwrap - Suto
products.description: These statement pieces are part of our zero-waste sustainable approach as we believe in maximizing the usage of all our fabrics.

products.name: Hidden in Ocho Rios | Art Print
products.description: In this piece, we daydream of an impromptu retreat in Ocho Rios, Jamaica in a hidden tree-house covered in palm leaves.

23.title: Understanding My Privilege
23.subtitle: University Chancellor, Susan E. Borrego, reflects on her life as an emancipated minor and dissects the emotionally charged conversation surrounding race relations in the United States. This raconteur uses her powerful first-person account of "White Privilege" and "Black Lives Matter" to underscore the responsibility each one of us has to bring about change.

24.title: Register to Vote
24.subtitle: Register to vote to make your voice heard and make sure the people we elect to positions of power have the best interests of every American in mind.

24.title: 10 killed in "racially motivated" mass shooting at Buffalo supermarket
24.subtitle: Police said the shooter has been charged with murder in what officials are calling a hate crime and a case of racially motivated violent extremism.

25.title: Innocence Project
25.subtitle: Donate to help free the innocent. The Innocence Project exonerates the wrongly convicted through DNA testing and reforms the criminal justice system to prevent future injustices.

25.title: Plum Good
25.subtitle: Plum Good locally produces, discriminately sources and proudly brings to market the highest quality culinary and restorative spices, herbs and tea blends available. Our mission is to help bring flavorful nutrition available to our customers.  We make All Natural rubs and blends, teas, jams and sauces.

products.name: Paprika Lime Blend
products.description: This SALT FREE blend of citrus, paprika, garlic, and lime gives color, zest, and mouth watering flavor to fish, chicken, and poultry.

products.name: Organic Chai Tea
products.description: Black Tea, Ginger, Cardamom, Cloves, Peppercorns Cinnamon

products.name: Sweet & Hot Chocolate Sauce
products.description: A culinary gourmet delight for cooks and foodies alike! Choice serrano and chocolate peppers, dark chocolate, balsamic vinegar, raw sugar, cardamom and water make a mouthwatering marinade, topping or accompaniment and make everything it comes into contact with delicious.

26.title: It’s Nola
26.subtitle: Reimagined healthy granola snack bites rolled into a ball for easy snacking pleasure. Bold flavor to match our bold Brooklyn lifestyle.

26.title: Cuff
26.subtitle: A platform for creating mature conversations through discussions of love and dating experiences.

27.title: Stay Informed: Ma'Khia Bryant Shooting
27.subtitle: A teenage girl who the police say threatened two girls with a knife was fatally shot by an officer in Columbus, Ohio, on Tuesday, April 20th, 2021, shortly before a jury reached a guilty verdict in the murder trial of the former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin in last year’s killing of George Floyd.

27.title: Racism has a cost for everyone
27.subtitle: Racism makes our economy worse — and not just in ways that harm people of color, says public policy expert Heather C. McGhee. From her research and travels across the US, McGhee shares startling insights into how racism fuels bad policymaking and drains our economic potential — and offers a crucial rethink on what we can do to create a more prosperous nation for all.

28.title: Automotive Heroes of Black History Month
28.subtitle: Ever wonder what driving would be like without turn signals or traffic lights? Well, without these great inventors, engineers, scientists, and pioneers of their field, driving wouldn’t be what it is today! In celebration of Black History Month, we want to share a few of their exciting stories with you.

28.title: The Other Wes Moore
28.subtitle: Two kids named Wes Moore were born blocks apart within a year of each other. Both grew up fatherless in similar Baltimore neighborhoods and had difficult childhoods; both hung out on street corners with their crews; both ran into trouble with the police. How, then, did one grow up to be a Rhodes Scholar, decorated veteran, White House Fellow, and business leader, while the other ended up a convicted murderer serving a life sentence?

29.title: Beauty Bakerie
29.subtitle: A single mother and breast cancer survivor, Cashmere Nicole founded Beauty Bakerie in 2011 as a new lipstick brand that was vegan, non-toxic and cruelty-free.

products.name: Chocolate Therapy Sugar Sticks
products.description: A castor oil infused lip liner collection that delivers high-quality custom coverage while lining & defining your lip look. Just add 1/2 cup of sugar and everything will be pretty sweet!

products.name: Eyelash Icing Waterproof Mascara
products.description: Enter the Beauty Bakerie freezer and start ice-ing with our NEW waterproof and volumizing Eyelash Icing Mascara. The perfect topper for your baked beat, Eyelash Icing Mascara will freeze your lashes in place for all-day, all-night long-lasting wear.

products.name: Blending Egg Beauty Sponges
products.description: Cooked up with you in mind, Blending Egg Beauty Sponges were uniquely created to fit in the palm of your hand for seamless blending. Try a recipe with a dash or two of Cake Face Concealer and bake until your heart's content with Flour Setting Powder. Blending Eggs will be your new favorite tool for eggs-traordinary cakin' that's hard to beat! Hehe.

29.title: Seventh & Oak
29.subtitle: With self care as our inspiration and sustainability at the hearth of all our products, we craft every candle by hand and with a truckload of love from our home to yours in the hopes that they bring a little more warmth and coziness to your space.

products.name: Zen candle
products.description: When you light the Zen candle, think about how you feel when your space is consumed with good energy and positive thoughts. Burn the Zen candle when you want to cleanse your space to rid it of any negative energy and bring in all the good vibes.

products.name: Namaste candle
products.description: Relaxing lavender beautifully balanced with sweet ylang ylang and grassy vetiver in a recyclable glass jar. Enjoy some time in bed with a good book (or a Netflix show - who's judging?) before heading to bed for your beauty sleep. Just remember to blow it out before drifting off to dreamland.

products.name: Serenity candle
products.description: Fruity but not overpowering; very bright and fresh as each note distinguishes itself. Light up Serenity when you want to freshen up your entryways, kitchens and bathrooms.

30.title: StepStitches
30.subtitle: Welcome to StepStitches where you can find unique keepsakes sure to delight. Each item is handmade with love and exquisite care. Both ready to ship and custom made items are available.

products.name: Black Rag Doll - Raggedy Ann Doll
products.description: Cinnamon Annie® is a delightful vintage style doll with a modern twist. This Raggedy Ann style doll is dressed in a pretty floral navy and yellow dress with matching hair bow. Doll dress and hair bow are removable.

products.name: Raggedy Andy Doll - Boy Doll
products.description: Cinnamon Andrew is a fun vintage style doll with a modern twist. This Raggedy Andy style doll is dressed in light blue overalls with a white shirt and dark blue bow tie. Doll clothes are removable.

products.name: Personalized Raggedy Ann Doll
products.description: If you would like a name embroidered on the doll's dress, please choose that option AND write the name or phrase in the Note to Seller box during check-out.  She is Made to Order and will take approximately two weeks to complete before shipping.

30.title: Fewer Cards
30.subtitle: Fewer Cards is a touchless smart card that allows you to express yourself and share who you are with others by exchanging contact information, social media, and data seamlessly. The concept of Fewer Cards started from the fact that exchanging paper business cards is wasteful and cumbersome.

31.title: A.O. Hamer
31.subtitle:
Hey, I'm Aramis and I love color!

My acrylic paintings are inspired by divine femininity, music, higher consciousness, and the cosmos. Liberation is my life's work- to free myself from the chains that could hold me back mentally, physically, and spiritually. My paintbrush reminds me of the creative power I have within the canvas - and life. As I take this journey to freedom, I hope to inspire others along the way.

31.title: Carter G. Woodson - African American Trailblazers in Virginia History
31.subtitle: Enjoy a six-minute podcast on the life of Carter G. Woodson who helped start the first Negro History Week.
